careers.name: User Experience Designer
careers.overview:
At ChainCode, we Combine medical expertise with Machine Learning to offer patients a primary care experiance like any other.

As the primary interface between patients and their medical team, Our mobile app is a strategic piece of the virtual clinic we are building.

As the primary interface between patients and their medical team, Our mobile app is a strategic piece of the virtual clinic we are building.

This position is full-time and based in Paris, but we are open to partial remote work.
content:
Roles & Responsibilities

The Swiggy Design team works with design oriented engineers, product managers and some of the best designers in a fast-paced, rapidly growing, hybrid (technology/operations) environment.

We are highly user-centric and we deeply believe we can innovate our way out of any box. The role demands great execution, bold innovation, obsession with quality, fearlessness and optimism to be inspired by the unknown and never settle, solving problems with creativity while keeping the user in mind and ambition to take projects to the finish line.

  • Create and refine comprehensive UX user flows for business-critical interactions.
  • Work with users and product teams to test, evaluate and iterate on product features.
  • Monitor and analyse data, how well existing interfaces work and where they breakdown.
  • Clearly and effectively communicate design processes, ideas, and solutions.

Ideal Candidate

  • You believe in craftsmanship and create elegant and compelling designs, over andover.
  • Your portfolio has some best-in-class work. You're a walking encyclopedia of microinteractions in use (on mobile, web, desktop, etc), and have nuanced views on how to make many of them even better.
  • You've shipped product.
  • You've weathered release cycles and know what details matter at each stage, how to motivate engineers to get the fit and finish right, how to translate insights from user studies into meaningful action, and what's most likely to go afoul at each stage. You can share several shining examples of real work you've shipped, and what you learned along the way.
  • You substantially contribute to defining the 'what' as well as the 'how'.
  • You're a product manager's secret weapon. You thrive best when helping to define the requirements, not just translating them into designs. You facilitate and draw the best design ideas from teammates.
  • You can think and talk about the bottom line.
  • Analytics don't scare you, and you know which features can act as force multipliers on your company's business model.
  • Prototyping is a key part of your toolset.
  • You've prototyped on multiple platforms. You've made last-minute tweaks between user studies. You know how to be all kinds of quick and dirty, but dream of better prototyping tools.
  • Cross-platform is your style.
  • Hopefully you've shipped something across several platforms. You know what translates from desktop and what doesn't, or why you'd opt for one solution for iOS and another on Android.

careers.name: Business Development Manager
careers.overview:
Chaincode consulting LLP is an emerging enterprise blockchain development and consulting firm. We help organizations revolutionize their businesses through blockchain. We work with our clients closely in accelerating the adoption of blockchain technology within their systems.

We are looking for a Business Development Manager who will lead initiatives to engage with potential partners to build new business and generate revenue for the company.

This candidate should be able to think critically and have a demonstrated ability to execute a particular strategy.
content:
Roles & Responsibilities

  • Generate valuable leads from different portals like Upwork, Freelance, Guru, LinkedIn, and via Mass Mails, Cold Calling, etc.
  • Grow new and existing accounts and manage the entire sales cycle from start to finish for delivery of customized business solutions.
  • Educate clients of all sizes on our value proposition and participate in deep architectural discussions to ensure solutions are designed for successful deployment in the cloud.
  • Identify and implement innovative business development and sales strategies to increase company profitability by fully leveraging product/service offerings.
  • Understand the queries and concerns raised by the potential customers and use a creative sales approach to pitch them our services
  • Develop a growth strategy focused both on revenue and customer satisfaction.
  • Planning and overseeing new marketing initiatives.
  • Conduct research to identify new markets and potential clients
  • Increase the value to current customers while attracting new ones.
  • Create proposals and write quotes for clients and arrange business meetings.
  • Develop goals for the internal teams and ensure they are met.
  • Formulate and execute a sales strategy to exceed revenue objectives through the adoption of AWS.

Ideal Candidate

  • Must have a Bachelor's degree in business, marketing, or related field.
  • Must be proficient in Word, Excel, Outlook, and PowerPoint.
  • Must have 3 - 4 years' prior industry-related sales/ marketing or business development experience.
  • Must have excellent communication and interpersonal skills and IT fluency (Emerging Technologies).
  • Must have hands-on experience with Blockchain projects.
  • Must possess proven experience in the execution of successful development strategies.
  • Should be focused and goal-oriented.
  • Flourish with minimal guidance, be proactive, and handle uncertainty.
  • Is willing to visit various clients as per the business requirement.
  • Is willing to work in different time zones.

careers.name: Digital Marketing Expert
careers.overview:
Chaincode consulting LLP is an emerging enterprise blockchain development and consulting firm. We help organizations revolutionize their businesses through blockchain. We work with our clients closely in accelerating the adoption of blockchain technology within their systems.

We are looking for a Digital Marketing Expert/ Manager who will build and manage the strategy and execution for digital marketing campaigns across all channels and ensure the highest possible return on investment.
content:
Roles & Responsibilities

  • Consult clients on various SEO & PPC Search Ad campaigns techniques and recent updates.
  • Manage daily responsibilities associated with PPC, Paid Campaigns, Google AdWords, Google Analytics, Tableau, Web Trends, etc.
  • Maintain and monitor keyword bids, daily and monthly budget caps, impression share, quality score, and other important account metrics.
  • Keep pace with search engine and PPC industry trends and developments.
  • Coordinate the project status & requisites between team and client.
  • Adjust campaigns to enhance visibility and site optimization for clients.
  • Create and maintain project documentation, plans, and reports.
  • Ensure standards and requirements of the respective project are timely met.
  • Communicate with team and management on project development, timelines, and results.
  • Measure and report on the performance of all digital marketing campaigns on LinkedIn and other social channels like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc.

Ideal Candidate

  • Must have a Bachelor's Degree in any stream.
  • Has a certification/course/diploma in a similar or related field of work or IT-related course of study.
  • Possesses demonstrable experience leading and managing SEO/SEM, ASO, marketing database, email, social media and/or display advertising campaigns.
  • Possesses prior experience in client handling and generating business leads.
  • Has basic knowledge of HTML/CSS and Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, and Outlook).

careers.name: Reactjs Developer
careers.overview:
Chaincode consulting LLP is an emerging enterprise blockchain development and consulting firm. We help organizations revolutionize their businesses through blockchain. We work with our clients closely in accelerating the adoption of blockchain technology within their systems.

We are looking for a ReactJS Developer who has good Knowledge of micro frontend development and helps build world-class decentralized applications.
content:
Roles & Responsibilities

As a Reactjs Developer, you will translate user stories into decentralized applications to solve critical business problems.

  • Leverage the inbuilt React toolkit for creating frontend features.
  • Translate wireframes and designs into good quality code.
  • Build structured, well documented and reusable code and libraries for long-term use.
  • Write application interface code with JavaScript.
  • Constantly monitor application performance and help in improvements.
  • Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability.
  • Making sure of cross-browser compatibility.
  • Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git.

Ideal Candidate

  • Must have experience of more than or equal to 2 years.
  • Must have knowledge about JavaScript, jQuery, Nodejs, Reacts, ExpressJs, NextJs, Git, GITHUB, SQL, MySQL, MongoDB.
  • Must have a basic understanding of front-end technologies, such as HTML5, and CSS3.
  • Should be open to learning new technologies (viz. Blockchain).
